text:
The copy task allows filtering. Thats wonderful. 
But i appreciate some more file specific filtering 
tokens like file name or line number.
In cpp there exists macros like __LINE__ and __FILE__.
Is it possible to integrate something like @__LINE__@ and
@__FILE__@?
creator: Robert.Hannebauer@t-online.de
bruce@callenish.com
text:
It is difficult to appreciate the usecase for this feature request. What is it that requires a build to have this feature?

Since this could easily be accomplished with a FilterReader, but hasn't been in the 10 years that this bug request has been opened, I am going to close it as a WONTFIX. If someone wants to submit a patch to provide the functionality along with a reason it is useful to include in Ant, please feel free to reopen.
